FuncDef: The display bgp vpnv6 update-peer-group command displays information about BGP VPNv6 update peer-groups.
CLIs: display bgp { vpnv6 vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> | vpnv6 all } update-peer-group [ index <update-group-index> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specify a VPN-Instance (VRF) name.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. In addition, the VPN instance name must not be _public_. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Display all information on VPNv6 and IPv6 VPN instance.
-

Index of update peer group.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 65535.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display bgp vpnv6 all update-peer-group index 0
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display bgp vpnv6 update-peer-group command displays information about BGP VPNv6 update peer-groups. Details about update peer-groups can be displayed based on the update peer-group index.
